findings.description: This is a legitimate CORS misconfiguration where the server reflects arbitrary origins with credentials allowed, potentially exposing sensitive WordPress API data to malicious domains.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create a malicious webpage that makes authenticated requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 from an attacker-controlled domain. The CORS policy will allow the request with credentials, potentially leaking sensitive page data or allowing unauthorized API access if the victim is logged into Plex.
